nodes.text: A Mandalorian was a captain in the renegade Sith Lord Maul's Mandalorian super commandos during the Clone Wars after the death of Pre Vizsla.

In 19 BBY, Sith brothers Maul and Savage Opress killed Mand'alor Pre Vizsla in order to claim Vizsla's Death Watch soldiers. This created a schism between the Mandalorians of Death Watch, with those loyal to Maul and Opress forming the Mandalorian super commandos and Bo-Katan Kryze, a supporter of Vizsla, leading the Mandalore resistance. During the schism, this Mandalorian allied himself with Maul and was a captain of the new super commandos. A short time later, the captain helped recapture Satine Kryze when she escaped prison, rendering Korkie Kryze unconscious in the process.
The captain wore Mandalorian armor that was complete with Maul's red and black aesthetic and even horns adorning his helmet that resembled the horns of his Zabrak leader.
